title: Grilling
creator_contributor_role: KQED-TV (Television station : San Francisco, Calif.), production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cookery
description: Episode of Series "Cooking at the Academy". Master the tips of grilling and gather a wealth of tips. Advice on proper heat levels, care of your grill, efficient skewering and marinating comes with succulent examples. "Grilled Shrimp Polynesian" with fruit, "Grilled Flank Steak Americaine" and rustic "Breast of Chicken Tuscan" with grilled vegetables are the recipes featured in this episode.
related_objects: Series; S01150; Cooking at the Academy; Active; 1991
